#### Problem 6.1
<!--- F-test multiple models --->
UN11 dataframe
```{r}

model6.6 <- lm(lifeExpF ~ 1, data=UN11)
model6.7 <- lm(lifeExpE ~ group,  data=UN11)

model6.8 <- lm(lifeExpE ~ log(ppgdp),  data=UN11)
model6.9 <- lm(lifeExpE ~ group + log(ppgdp),  data=UN11)
model6.10 <- lm(lifeExpE ~ group + log(ppgdp) + group:log(ppgdp),  data=UN11)

summary(model6.6)

summary(model6.7)
```
